Continued EP Control When Examinations Are Rescheduled
Regional office (RO) personnel must maintain EP control over claims in which the examination facility or contract examination vendor of jurisdiction reschedules an appointment or directs resubmission of an examination request, to include by way of a request for clarification.
Note
:  Contract examination vendors use clarification requests with a variety of narrative reason values to denote examination appointment scheduling irregularities.  The
only
such reason value that may be appropriately considered equivalent to a failure to report for examination, thus warranting application of procedures discussed in
M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, 2.F
, is
No Show
.
